遏.definition: to restrain; to check; to hold back

遏制.definition: to check; to contain; to hold back; to keep within limits; to constrain; to restrain

遏止.definition: to hold back; to check (i.e. to stop sb's advance); to resist; esp. with negative, irresistible, unstoppable etc

遏阻.definition: to stop; to contain; to deter
